item.title: Marketing Dashboard on Google Spreadsheets
item.description: How I created an automated/self-updating marketing dashboard on Google Spreadsheets Background Perhaps I should first provide some background/context on this project that I worked on. For those that don’t know, I am interning at a commercial real estate tech startup in NYC for a year as part of a school programme that my university provided. So when I first entered my internship company, I noticed that sales/marketing data were all being tracked on Google Spreadsheets.
